title: Is Your Fridge Giving Away Your Personal Data? - WMRR-FM Muskegon
text:
You could lose your personal information through your refrigerator, and there's nothing the government can do to protect you. { "position1" : { "type" : "show", "id" : 20697909, "name" : "24/7 News: Technology", "description" : "The latest news from 24/7 News."
 WMRR-FM Muskegon.
